author: Charles Lamb
message: The greatest pleasure I know is to do a good action by stealth, and to have it found out by accident.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Muir
message: When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Winston Churchill
message: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
title: Thought of the day

author: Helen Keller
message: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
title: Thought of the day
